bioconda.name: star-fusion
bioconda.summary: STAR-Fusion fusion variant caller. All dependencies required to run FusionInspector and FusionAnnotator are included.

biocontainers.name: star-fusion
biocontainers.summary: Star-fusion fusion variant caller. all dependencies required to run fusioninspector and fusionannotator are included.

biotools.summary: STAR-Fusion, a method that is both fast and accurate in identifying fusion transcripts from RNA-Seq data
